function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low DCR leading to a temporary halt in case increase","Impact":"Potential for a sudden surge in case numbers after data collection period","Mitigation":"Implement proactive surveillance measures to closely monitor for any sudden increases in case numbers","Technologies":"Data analytics and real-time monitoring systems","People":"General population, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Social equity indicators and spatial differences","Impact":"Unequal distribution of resources and support in different areas","Mitigation":"Implement policies and interventions to address social inequities in access to healthcare and support services","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, community outreach programs","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income populations","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Mobility patterns and behaviors during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases due to mobility patterns","Mitigation":"Promote and facilitate remote work and reduce reliance on public transportation","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, telecommuting infrastructure","People":"Commuters, urban residents","Owner":"Employers, urban planners"}]}
